Summary

s_logistic_single.Rd

Summary of logistic regression with no interaction term

s_logistic_single(glm_model, conf_level = 0.95)

Arguments

glm_model

(glm model object)
with all main effect model.
conf_level

(numeric value) confidence level for Wald's odds ratio confidence interval.

Examples

library(random.cdisc.data)
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)

ADSL <- radsl(cached = TRUE)
ADSL <- ADSL %>% mutate(
 SEX = as.character(SEX),
 SEX = case_when(!SEX %in% c("F", "M") ~ "U",
               TRUE ~ SEX))
ADRS <- radrs(ADSL, seed = 2)
ADRS_f <- subset(ADRS, PARAMCD == "BESRSPI") %>%
  mutate(Response = case_when(AVALC %in% c("PR", "CR") ~ 1,
                              TRUE ~ 0))
glm_model <- glm(
 formula = Response ~ ARM + AGE + SEX,
 data = ADRS_f,
 family = "binomial")
s_logistic_single(glm_model, conf_level = 0.90)
#> $N
#> [1] 400
#> 
#> $results
#> $results$ARM
#> $results$ARM$main
#>     df  p-value
#> ARM  2 0.075761
#> 
#> $results$ARM$predictor
#> $results$ARM$predictor$term_type
#> [1] "categorical"
#> 
#> $results$ARM$predictor$term_ref_level
#> [1] "A: Drug X"
#> 
#> $results$ARM$predictor$term_comp_level
#> [1] "B: Placebo"     "C: Combination"

#> $results$ARM$predictor$counts_by_level
